Name: Singularity Runner
About the game: Singularity Runner is a simple casual game that relies on your reflexes. The player-controlled hero runs forward automatically, and the player can control his running path. When a hero changes course, the player scores points, but he cannot touch enemies unless he is in possession of a sword or shield. The shield will protect the player from death, but it will disappear after hitting the enemy and interrupt the combo score. The sword also disappears after hitting an enemy, but additionally it defeats him and does not interrupt the combo score. When a player enters an opponent without a sword or shield, the game ends and the points scored are saved in the ranking. Game Modes You can play campaign or arcade. Campaign has 6 levels to finish. There are three arcade game modes: Endless Game, Time Limit and Time Attack. Each mode has a separate ranking. Run to victory, avoid or defeat your opponents, catch animals - helpers, collect useful items and much more! Game Control Left click to change the player's path. Achivements: Lots of achievements to unlock!
